author: dain
msg: Fixed DBCP-269 JDBC connection never closes
When closing a PoolableConnection the decision to return or destroy the proxy should be based on the underlying connection and not the proxy state
The connection proxy should be closable multiple times without throwing an exception

author: lenzi
msg: Removed from "Used" section of the NOTICE files the reference to item already listed in the "Included" section
Added LICENSE.cgupnpjava for all the project iherting, using, or including cgupnpjava source code
